definition: to peel/to remove the skin/to tare

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Skin carrot and cut in to pieces. Skin shallots.
sentences.chinese: 紅蘿蔔去皮切塊，紅蔥頭去皮保持原粒。

sentences.english: Skin carrot and cut in to pieces. Skin shallots.
sentences.chinese: 紅蘿蔔去皮切塊，紅蔥頭去皮保持原粒。

sentences.english: A sharp skinning or boning knife is appropriate for this part of the operation.
sentences.chinese: 放血需要一把鋒利的去皮刀或剔骨刀。

sentences.english: Skin and then dice the chicken fillet into cubes . Season and marinate for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把雞肉去皮後切粒，拌入調味料醃15分鐘。

sentences.english: Peel and slice the avocado and add to bowl with watercress.
sentences.chinese: 把鱷梨去皮切薄片，和豆瓣菜一起放入碗中。

sentences.english: Skin lotus root. Wash and grate. Then mix it with seasoning 2.
sentences.chinese: 蓮藕去皮洗淨磨成茸，加調味攪勻。
將青瓜及紅蘿蔔去皮，切絲。

sentences.english: After the jujube boils thoroughly takes out, skins food it.
sentences.chinese: 棗煮熟後取出，去皮食之。

sentences.english: Peel the carrot and cut it into strips.
sentences.chinese: 將胡蘿蔔去皮後，切成細絲。

sentences.english: This thesis achieves a total design of apple-skinning machine, makes a exact description of the machine′s working principle.
sentences.chinese: 包括蘋果去皮機的總體設計，描述了機器的工作原理。

sentences.english: Wash the cucumber, peeled and cut into thin slices to the heart.
sentences.chinese: 將胡瓜洗淨，去皮去心切成裂片。

sentences.english: Peel and slice bananas, immerse in salt water, remove and dry.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉去皮切片，泡於鹽水中撈起瀝乾備用。

sentences.english: Peel and cut the fruit in different shapes. Arrange on plate.
sentences.chinese: 將水果去皮，並切成各種形狀，擺放在盤子中。

sentences.english: Peel and core the mango. Set aside.
Peel mangoes and cut flesh into strips. Cut green chilli peppers into circles.
sentences.chinese: 芒果去皮刨絲，辣椒仔切成小圈狀。

definition: to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
chunks obtained by repeatedly cutting a vegetable diagonally and rotating the vegetable after each cut
to slice/slice/thin section of a specimen (for microscopic examination)
(of a male) to come of age/an adult male
to mash/to beat to a pulp
